title: I'm Committed to 6 Workouts a Week This Summer—36 Activewear Pieces in My Cart RN
description: Summer workouts hit different, and so should your activewear.
excerpt: From stylish matching sets to flattering leggings, these are the 36 best activewear pieces to shop this summer—curated for everything from Pilates to padel.
text: I'm always a gym person, but summer brings the most intense fitness routine out of me. I like to add more things to the mix—like long walks, padel and tennis games with friends, and extra workouts—since the sun is out for far longer. This summer in particular, I've decided to go all in. I've booked the classes, I've picked a playlist, and most importantly, I've stocked my cart with the kind of activewear that actually makes me want to show up.Whether it's a chic matching set that doubles as an errand outfit or a buttery-soft sports bra I never want to take off, these pieces are helping me romanticize movement again. If you're also in your fitness era—or just need a cute new-legging moment—these are the 36 activewear finds I'm eyeing right now. Reformation Active Adelina Ecomove Two Piece Set A very popular Reformation linen set also comes in the activewear variety. This is such a flattering style, and the preorder stock is almost sold out. This brand makes activewear look runway ready. Girlfriend Collective Mariposa Fiona Ruched Dress How fun is this new style? GOLDEN GOOSE Soul-Star Distressed Leather-Trimmed Suede Sneakers Get these before they're gone to walk to your Pilates class in. My next purchase would have to be this. alo Cropped Accolade Crewneck Draped on the shoulders in between a workout and coffee meeting. The kind of thing I'd want to wear on the padel courts this summer. On Movement Strappy Sports Bra H&M Sports Leggings With Softmove H&M Seamless Sports Leggings With Drymove I'm obsessed with these leggings. The type of outfit that would inspire anyone to work out. Free People Swing of Things Mixed Media Tennis Dress One of my go-to tennis dresses. Another go-to look of mine. Left on Friday Super Moves Tight This brand's activewear is butter soft. The structure and support you want and need. Bring on the extra support. The ribbed moment is always a good idea. Left on Friday Barre Tank One of my favorite sets to date. alo High-Waist 7/8 Better Together Legging The double-layer look is pretty much everywhere. Beyond Yoga Shirred Crop Camisole The ruching is so flattering. Free People Go To Henley Camisole Something you can wear to work out or with your favorite skirt. Everyone will ask you where this windbreaker is from. Vuori Clementine Pleated Miniskirt H&M Tennis Circle Skirt With Drymove I've been wearing tennis skirts for each and every kind of workout these days. H&M Bike Shorts With Softmove H&M activewear is on my list of things to try. The ultimate sculpt moment. This look is giving Ferragamo balletcore. Nike Zenvy Rib Light Support Padded Sports Bra Port de Bras Kasumi Dress Such a flattering moment for the courts. Girlfriend Collective Black Zoe Superstretch Tank Beyond Yoga Space Dye On the Up Crop Tank ISABEL MARANT Bryce Leather-Trimmed Suede Sneakers For hot girl walks and cozy nights in. Sierra Mayhew is a fashion editor at Who What Wear, bringing a decade of industry experience to the editorial team. Since joining in 2021, she has made her mark by blending luxury and accessible fashion, decoding runway trends, and curating must-have shopping lists. Before joining Who What Wear, Sierra sharpened her skills at Harper's Bazaar and Elle, with bylines in Bazaar.com and collaborated with iconic brands such as Gucci and Ferragamo. A graduate of the University of Notre Dame, Sierra translates editorial expertise into viral social content, making fashion engaging for a new generation. Her unique perspective is rooted in her love for travel, music, and discovering the hidden gems that make New York City a constant source of inspiration.
html:
I'm always a gym person, but summer brings the most intense fitness routine out of me. I like to add more things to the mix—like long walks, padel and tennis games with friends, and extra workouts—since the sun is out for far longer. This summer in particular, I've decided to go all in. I've booked the classes, I've picked a playlist, and most importantly, I've stocked my cart with the kind of activewear that actually makes me want to show up.

Whether it's a chic matching set that doubles as an errand outfit or a buttery-soft sports bra I never want to take off, these pieces are helping me romanticize movement again. If you're also in your fitness era—or just need a cute new-legging moment—these are the 36 activewear finds I'm eyeing right now.

Reformation Active

Adelina Ecomove Two Piece Set

A very popular Reformation linen set also comes in the activewear variety.

This is such a flattering style, and the preorder stock is almost sold out.

This brand makes activewear look runway ready.

Girlfriend Collective

Mariposa Fiona Ruched Dress

How fun is this new style?

GOLDEN GOOSE

Soul-Star Distressed Leather-Trimmed Suede Sneakers

Get these before they're gone to walk to your Pilates class in.

My next purchase would have to be this.

alo

Cropped Accolade Crewneck

Draped on the shoulders in between a workout and coffee meeting.

The kind of thing I'd want to wear on the padel courts this summer.

On

Movement Strappy Sports Bra

H&M

Sports Leggings With Softmove

H&M

Seamless Sports Leggings With Drymove

I'm obsessed with these leggings.

The type of outfit that would inspire anyone to work out.

Free People

Swing of Things Mixed Media Tennis Dress

One of my go-to tennis dresses.

Another go-to look of mine.

Left on Friday

Super Moves Tight

This brand's activewear is butter soft.

The structure and support you want and need.

Bring on the extra support.

The ribbed moment is always a good idea.

Barre Tank

One of my favorite sets to date.

alo

The double-layer look is pretty much everywhere.

The ruching is so flattering.

Something you can wear to work out or with your favorite skirt.

Everyone will ask you where this windbreaker is from.

I've been wearing tennis skirts for each and every kind of workout these days.

H&M activewear is on my list of things to try.

The ultimate sculpt moment.

This look is giving Ferragamo balletcore.

Such a flattering moment for the courts.

For hot girl walks and cozy nights in.

Sierra Mayhew is a fashion editor at Who What Wear, bringing a decade of industry experience to the editorial team. Since joining in 2021, she has made her mark by blending luxury and accessible fashion, decoding runway trends, and curating must-have shopping lists. Before joining Who What Wear, Sierra sharpened her skills at Harper's Bazaar and Elle, with bylines in Bazaar.com and collaborated with iconic brands such as Gucci and Ferragamo. A graduate of the University of Notre Dame, Sierra translates editorial expertise into viral social content, making fashion engaging for a new generation. Her unique perspective is rooted in her love for travel, music, and discovering the hidden gems that make New York City a constant source of inspiration.
